channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The newly released Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ is already 44% off ahead of Boxing Day
item.description: The Galaxy Tab A11+, which improves upon the popular Tab A9+ with a better chip and 128GB of base storage, can be yours for just AU$297.

item.title: Honey: all the news about PayPal’s alleged scam coupon app
item.description: PayPal’s Honey browser extension has been lauded for years as an easy way to find coupons online. But some are calling it a “scam” after a deep dive from YouTuber MegaLag, who accused Honey of “stealing money from influencers,” and returned one year later with a second video that says Honey targeted minors, collected data […]
